meanings.definition: A painless ulcer, particularly one developing on the genitals as a result of syphilis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with a chancre on his genitals.
meanings.sent2: She was worried when she noticed a chancre on her skin.
meanings.sent3: The chancre on the skin seemed to have a mind of its own, playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The chancre of deceit slowly spread its influence throughout the community.
meanings.sent5: The vivid red chancre stood out starkly against the pale skin.
